articles.author: Alex Halverson
articles.title: Thousands could be laid off as Seattle-area tech giant cuts jobs - The Seattle Times
articles.description: More than 6,000 employees could be affected in Microsoft's latest round of layoffs.
articles.content:
Microsoft confirmed Tuesday that it’s laying off thousands of employees across the company.
The Redmond-based tech giant didn’t disclose how many employees it plans to lay off, but a spokesperson sa… [+1003 chars]
